forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the gentle embrace of a sunny San Francisco afternoon, the atmosphere hangs light and inviting, with clouds little more than wisps in the expansive blue above. The city beneath is awash in daylight, a pleasing cacophony of warm temperatures that gracefully glide around the high 70s, giving way to the serenity of evening’s approach, settling into the mid-50s. A soft breeze from the south-southwest stirs the air, lending a refreshing touch as it dances through the streets and alleyways, whispering amongst the lingering scents of coffee and baked bread.

As one gazes across this vibrant landscape, the clarity is striking—clear views of the Golden Gate Bridge stand proud against the horizon, revealing no awkward encroachments of fog or haze to mar the picturesque scene. This visual harmony invites one to savor the day—perhaps with a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or perched at an outdoor café to witness the ebb and flow of life around. Opting for layers, a light jacket or sweater will ensure comfort as the sun dips, especially when the coolness of sea air begins to embrace the city. It’s a day painting a perfect canvas, urging you to explore, to breathe in the beauty that unfolds at every corner and to let the allure of San Francisco charm you just a little more deeply.
